alert.note: Alert for Pacific (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 07 at 12:47PM PST until January 07 at 9:27PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. Willapa River near Willapa affecting Pacific County. Naselle River near Naselle affecting Pacific and Wahkiakum Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Willapa River near Willapa. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect widespread flooding. Numerous roads are flooded with deep and swiftly moving water, including Heckard Road and US Hwy 101. The magnitude of flooding on Hwy 101 will depend on the tide. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM PST Friday the stage was 23.0 feet. - It appears that the river has crested and is slowly receding. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued tonight at 1000 PM PST.
